Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi akukho ukudla ngaphandle kokuphuma ezilondeni (uma kugezwa izilonda)
Futhi kona akusiyona inkulumo yembongi, kuncane lokho enikukholwayo
Futhi akusiyona inkulumo yesangoma, kuncane lokho enikukhumbulayo
Futhi ukube bewuziqambile ezinye izinkulumo mayelana nathi
Futhi akekho noyedwa wenu ongakuvimba (lokho) kuyena
Futhi ngempela siyazi ukuthi phakathi kwenu kunabaphika (ukholo)
Ngakho-ke dumisa igama leNkosi yakho enkulu
Zenyukela kuyena izingelosi kanye nomoya ngosuku isilinganiso salo esiyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu zeminyaka
Ngosuku	lapho	isibhakabhaka	siyoba	njengethusi elincibilikayo (noma njengensalela yamafutha)
